name: Bee Yourself!
description:
A short fun adventure made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020.

Move left and right with A and D. Space to jump, R to reset. You use the mouse buttons too!

Programmed by Riley Miller with Godot Engine. You can find the code here: https://github.com/assert-justice/SecretSantaJam

I used music from these sources: https://opengameart.org/content/music-mix-more-music-inside

https://opengameart.org/content/hella-bumps-menu-music

And the art is from the prolific and talented Kenney: https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-art-deluxe

Dedicated to my giftee Sunsid.

Happy holidays!
